definition: theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
The Phantom of the Opera by Andrew Lloyd Webber

sentences.english: In 1608, the partnership also took over the Blackfriars indoor theatre.
sentences.chinese: 1608年，黑衣修士剧院也被他们接管。

sentences.english: At the same time, I knew that in the theater in our hometown I would care.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，我知道在家乡的剧院我就不能这么放肆了。

sentences.english: Theatres put on special shows for children during the Christmas season.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节期间剧院为儿童举行专场演出。

sentences.english: Do you mean the Performing Arts Theater on Marshall Street?
sentences.chinese: 你是指在马歇尔街的表演艺术剧院吗？

sentences.english: There is an art theatre round the corner.
sentences.chinese: 在街拐角有一所艺术剧院。

sentences.english: There was a large appreciative audience in the theatre .
sentences.chinese: 剧院里坐满了有欣赏力的听众。

sentences.english: They have reserved a box for us in the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 他们在剧院为我们预订了一个包厢。

sentences.english: And then you actually go on a bit of a tour around the reconstructed Globe Theatre.
sentences.chinese: 然后，你可以继续参观重修后的环球剧院。

sentences.english: The ater-style wedding is now a new style of wedding ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 剧院式婚礼是当下一种新兴的时尚婚礼仪式。

sentences.english: Crowds flocked after the popular singer as she left the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 当受欢迎的歌手离开剧院时，一大群人尾追着她。

sentences.english: In 1998 it was named officially as Jinan Children's Art Theater.
sentences.chinese: 1998年正式定名为济南市儿童艺术剧院。

sentences.english: Meng Ni and also after the rehearsal, the constant waiting at the gate of the theatre Meng Ni again.
sentences.chinese: 孟妮与亦名排练完后，之恒又在剧院门口等着孟妮。

sentences.english: Council of Ministers raised the theater with "a" square tower "is" a stylish matching cherry finish.
sentences.chinese: 该剧院电梯内阁匹配方塔采用的是时尚的樱桃完成。

sentences.english: He had met a Bolshoi ensemble girl.
sentences.chinese: 他碰到“大剧院”剧团里的一个姑娘。

sentences.english: Oh, I've only been a few times but, I mean, I love the Theater District.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我只去过几次，我是说，我喜欢剧院区。

sentences.english: This year the event will be held in the brand-new Kodak Theater.
sentences.chinese: 今年的颁奖典礼将在崭新的柯达剧院举行。
